mapper.select: SELECT id, (SELECT NAME FROM team t WHERE t.id = p.teamId) teamname, p.name,p.position ,DATE_FORMAT(p.createDate, '%Y년-%m월-%d일')createDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY p.name DESC) AS ROW FROM player p
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stadium(name, createDate) VALUE(#{name}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE stadium SET name = #{name} WHERE id =#{id}
